Mr Andy Coulson , who joined the Prime Minister, David Cameron , as his Director of Communications after last year's election, quit overnight unexpectedly conceding that his involvement in the affair made it difficult to give the 110 per cent needed in the job. Sergio Marchionne chose the term performance award rather than profit sharing because it's difficult to talk about profit sharing when you have a negative number at the bottom line. The Chrysler news came Monday amid projections that U.S. automobile sales in January may have reached the second-fastest pace in 17 months, aided by rising business spending and consumer confidence.
